All relevant factors and their interrelationships are considered in process determination. 5 Processes and the interactions of leadership with all levels of the organization are dynamically determined and used to establish and sustain the success of the organization. a Items outlined in levels 3 to 5 are intended to be a progression of thought that is based on the guidance provided in the applicable subclause. b This may include recognition of aspects where the organization is partially meeting a maturity level. 30  Copyright International Organization for Standardization ﻿ Order Number: 02315644 © ISO 2018 – All rights reserved Provided
